text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text: Fortunately, we caught it in time and there's no more danger to your life but… considering your age as well, I can't recommend continuing as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: I see… it seems this day has finally come, hasn't it? …I'm sorry, Bell-chan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer, it's not something you need to apologize for!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I should be… I should be the one apologizing, for continuing to be as weak as I am…!
In the end, Chief Trainer was forced to retire just like that.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san. From now on… please, I'll leave it to you.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: It'll be fine…… you'll be fine. Definitely, if it's you――
Two weeks after her formal resignation. The team was left to me, the sub-trainer, and it would be up to Mejiro Dober whether to stay or not.
For that reason, it was necessary to hear what she thought about it, but…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Sorry, can we talk about this later? Right now… I want to get back to training, so for now…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Sorry, right now, I don't have the leeway to think about that. For now, let me just focus on training…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: There's only two weeks left! Until then, no matter what…… I absolutely, need to win a race……!!
It's been two or three days since I took over, I've been swamped with work this whole time, and I haven't had any free time.
But now, I've finally made some progress, eventually what came to mind was Mejiro Dober's overwhelming grief――
choice_data_list: I should go check on her……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa…… haaa……
choice_data_list: Dober!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard
Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……?! Ah…… Sub-trainer……
choice_data_list: Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard
Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Shut up…… leave me alone!
choice_data_list: But, if you keep going――
But, if you keep going――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Please, just leave me alone. I told you already, right now just let me keep training……!
choice_data_list: But, if you keep going――
But, if you keep going――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I need to keep going though!! Because I'm weak!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I need to keep going though!! Because I'm weak!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I've always, always…… been weak!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: At first I thought I could win. Running as dignified as Bright, or showing everyone I can be as strong as Ryan――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: To show everyone that I, as a Mejiro Uma Musume, am just as outstanding as them. But……!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: ――And now first place has crossed the goal! And one by one the others are finishing! Everyone, please give a big round of applause for everyone that did their best!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Ah! 8th place, Mejiro Dober-chan is rounding the final corner! She may have tripped and fallen at the start, but she hasn't given up and is doing her best!

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa……!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Go on, you're doing great-! Do your best until the end-!! You're almost there～! Everyone's watching you～!

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa…… uuuuu……!!

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: Doing great……? Do your best……? It's fine……? I've never heard them say things like that to Ryan and Bright.

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: About Ryan and Bright, they're always saying things like how fast, how great they are…… but for me…… like this……!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ――The result was miserable. Falling at the start, only being halfway when they reached the goal. Ever since then…… it's felt like everyone was laughing at me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Like they were saying how pathetic, how weak I was…… when I think that, my heart starts pounding strangely faster, and my hands and feet feel like they're not my own……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Because of that, I can't even run properly……! These things that everyone can do naturally, I'm the only one that can't do them at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Together with Trainer, I thought I had gotten a little bit stronger. But, now I can't rely on her any longer……!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: In that case! Even with all that, That's why I have to win a race! Even if I have to push myself, I have to keep going, I have no choice but to do it, right?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Because I'm weak!! Even if I'm alone, I need to get stronger……!
choice_data_list: ……but you're not alone

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ha……?
choice_data_list: I'll support you
I'll support you

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……What? Now that you've replaced Trainer, I'll get stronger, are you saying it'll be fine? There's no way I can suddenly believe――!
choice_data_list: Wrong, you're already a strong Uma Musume!
Wrong, you're already a strong Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Eh, you, didn't you hear a word I just said?! Didn't I say I was weak?! Ever since then, I've……!!
choice_data_list: But this whole time, you've never given up
But this whole time, you've never given up

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Not yet, not yeeeeet!! ――Aaaaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……That's why, speaking with you, is a kind of mental training! As the sub-trainer, hearing me out is part of your obligations, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's why…… even if it's a little bit at a time. Just like this, speaking to someone I'm not familiar with, might help me mentally…… can you help me with that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: There's only 2 weeks left! Until then, no matter what…… I absolutely, need to win a race……!!
Even now that's true. Mejiro Dober is continuing to fight on, even if she has to do it alone. 『Race and win』 ――always aiming for that.
choice_data_list: An Uma Musume who doesn't give up, can't be weak

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: "Mejiro Dober" is a strong Uma Musume
"Mejiro Dober" is a strong Uma Musume

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: Dober! I'll be waiting for you!
Dober! I'll be waiting for you!

text_block_list.text: Mejiro Dober is a strong Uma Musume, even on her own. But still…… if she ever needs my support, I hope she'll come to me.
As she ran off, I called out like that with all I could muster.
